parameters.description: A valid user access token or your client credentials.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: A country: an [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). Provide this parameter if you want the list of returned items to be relevant to a particular country. If omitted, the returned items will be relevant to all countries.
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The index of the first item to return. Default: 0 (the first object). Use with `limit` to get the next set of items.
parameters.name: offset
